post:
We are pleased to share this exclusive offer with the LowEndTalk community.  

<em>&nbsp;<em>
[![OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only. Made in Germany.](https://www.onvirt.io/assets/OnVirt_724x58.png)](https://www.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only. Made in Germany")  
<em>&nbsp;<em>

> [**OnVirt • VPS Tiny** (6-months special)](https://www.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only. Made in Germany")
> -
> * 512MB RAM (dedicated, no overcommit, real RAM - no swap)
> * 1 CPU core
> * 20GB SSD space (RAID10)
> * 500GB transfer
> * **Coupon: LET-Tiny6**  ([direct order link](https://www.onvirt.io/customers/cart.php?a=add&pid=5&billingcycle=semiannually&promocode=LET-Tiny6 "OnVirt • VPS Tiny (6-months special)"))
> * **19 EUR / semi annual** (final price, no additional tax)

<em><em>

**Features**
-

Each VPS from OnVirt has the following features:

* 100Mbps uplink
* 1x IPv4
* 1x IPv6
* KVM Virtualization
* Instant setup
* Operating Systems: Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora and CentOS
* Note: Port 25 is blocked in our network
* **Indiviual .iso** available upon [request](https://www.onvirt.io/customers/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2&subject=ISO%20Request "OnVirt - Support")
* **BGP sessions** are available upon request (charges apply). Please contact [OnVirt Support](https://www.onvirt.io/customers/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2&subject=BGP%20Request "OnVirt - Support") with your AS number.  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

**Technical**
-

Our VPS are running on the following **enterprise hardware**:

* Intel Xeon E5-1620v3 CPUs
* DDR4 ECC RAM
* Enterprise-level SSDs (ZFS RAID10, 1.2GB/s GetIPAddrEU benchmark listed below)
* SuperMicro Rackservers

Check out our **Looking Glass** at [http://lg.onvirt.io/](http://lg.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt - Looking Glass"):  

* Test IPv4: 5.1.75.5  
* Test IPv6: 2a00:f820:50::13:5  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

OnVirt is committed to its outstanding VPS performance. To guarantee high VPS performance we are only using quality hardware, KVM virtualziation and do **not** oversubscribe our systems.  

We offer a **14-days full money back guarantee** to convince yourself.
We currently accept PayPal and SEPA Bank Transfer.  

Our high availability and Tier 3 (TIER III) certified datacenter is located in Frankfurt, Germany.
The datacenter is equipped with first class carrier connectivity and direct uplinks (each 10 Gbit/s) to Deutsche Telekom (DTAG), DECiX / ECIX, GTT, Cogent, Hibernia, Hurricane Electric, KleyRex.

We have been featured twice on [LowEndBox.com](http://lowendbox.com/tag/onvirt-io/ "OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only. Made in Germany").   
Let un know what you think about our 6-months special.

<em>&nbsp;<em>

Best Regards  
Sebastian from [OnVirt](https://www.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only. Made in Germany")
